item.title: How to Migrate R Packages to an Offline Server
item.description: I am recently conducting R analysis in a server connected to the database within the firewall, which means the computer has no access to the Internet. The Major problem with R offline analysis is that packages cannot be directly installed from CRAN. This article will illustrate how to migrate R packages from a computer with Internet access (Computer Online) to the offline server (Computer Offline).
